tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Doctor Devang explained each step of the procedure in detail. Since there were two procedures to be carried out on the same day, a dental implant and wisdom tooth extraction, the overall procedure took about an hour. He was considerate of the inconvenience I might feel during the procedures. Hence, instead of rushing through the procedure, he let me take breaks in between while patiently waiting for me to signal him to resume. 
And of course, the entire procedure was painless despite being complicated one.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctors at The Dental House are very friendly, ****** ******* and give patients the right guidance. Doctors don't unnecessarily advice for expensive treatment options, rather suggest the most cost effective solution to the dental issues. I got my RCT, Tooth extraction, scaling etc done and am very happy with the treatment outcome all the time. ****** ******* doctors ensured painless experience and quick healing as well.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited Dr. Devang for my wisdom tooth extraction, the extraction surgery went very smoothly. He explained very well each and every procedure.Dr. Devang and his staff are very sweet and helpful. He explained the post op care instructions nicely which helped in a painless and smooth recovery. Overall had a good experience with him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
Wonderful Doctor..He has completed my 2 wisdom tooth extraction just in 5 mins each..He is a person with magic hands..Great doctor...Every moment he checks if patient is comfortable or not..Almost painless experience..
Very very happy with the doctor ..Surely recommend him..
I must say I took a right decision by doing my wisdom tooth extractions from Devang Sir..
He is very polite person with lots of patience.
I wanted to thank him personally but couldn't got that chance as he was busy with another patient..
Thank you so much Sir for making the most scariest thing soo bearable for me..You are greatüôèüòä
